website_summaries.verdict: The Nike Renew Rival received many positive remarks from consumers. They considered this road running companion to be a reliable option during quick running sessions and urban adventures. It’s as though they welcomed it primarily as a part of their fashion apparel. There were complaints about the midsole being a bit uncomfortable, but such claims were uncommon.
pros: People were generally happy with the aesthetics of the Nike Renew Rival
they noted that the colors were eye-catching
Many runners thought that the upper unit offered suitable support
The majority of consumers believed that the sizing scheme of this running shoe accommodated their expectations
The cushioning capability of the midsole unit was trusted by those who have tested it
According to some purchasers, this shoe didn’t need a break-in period
it was agreeable from the start
The slip-on design made the Renew Rival effortless to put on
cons: Some rare instances yielded a few disgruntled consumers who didn’t like the underfoot experience of the Nike Renew Rival

customer_reviews.title: True to what was advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he loved it. We jogged around our subdivision And he said it felt great. Quality was on point. Will buy again if needed. Shoe size is very accurate. Didn’t need to go up or down a size.
customer_reviews.author: Ele

customer_reviews.title: love story
customer_reviews.text: im a long time nike bubble shoes faithful, regardless of cost, until 2019!, tried this running shoe because of sale price at livermore outlet ant it was love at first sight ! my feet have never been so happy, so loved!, now my goal is to replace every nike shoes i got with these, and then stock pile, because they will not sell forever.
customer_reviews.author: miguel ocasio

customer_reviews.title: Unacceptably poor quality at a higher price
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely unacceptable. I desperately needed these specific shoes, and when I got them, the heel of the right one is completely dysfunctional and digs into my heel. I paid extra money to buy from this service because I was guaranteed quality, but instead I was given this poorly created shoe. I don't know if anyone actually does a quality check, or if this was someone else's that was returned and they didn't bother to look at it before shipping it off to the next customer. All I know is that my money was wasted and I have to deal with wearing this shoe digging into my heels out of necessity. Can't return it because I need it immediately. Terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Mark S.

customer_reviews.title: Nike
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product was nice affordable and it came on time and I like the sneaker I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Performance at great price
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable running shoe with good arch support. The styling, performance and price make this a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Paul M. Vance

customer_reviews.title: Perfect everyday shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. I am thinking of buying 4 more pairs in case they quit selling them.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Quality is a concern
customer_reviews.text: After only wearing these shoes twice, they started to show wear down by his toe. Very disappointed in this Nike shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Lee Stiff

customer_reviews.title: Nike Shoe
customer_reviews.text: As advertised on Amazon, the shoe is true to fit . . . I like the shoe because it fits like an outer sock, and has plenty of support for the walkers, which delivers comfort. Not to mention, it s also a nice looking show.
customer_reviews.author: David Lucas

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, size 11, even though I wear a size 10 shoe. Also a beautiful shoe. I always buy Nike's because I wear a narrow size and these are perfect....narrow in the instep and heel with a wide toe area. Shipping was on time with a perfect delivery, even during the holidays.. Will purchase again from Amazon the same shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe for walking
customer_reviews.text: Nike Renew Rival is a great shoe for arch support. Use it for fast walking...running days are past. 2nd pair I have purchased. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Don Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe... big arch support
customer_reviews.text: Love this pair, fits perfect to size. Only thing I would say is it does have a larger arch support. I got used to it but I know a lot of people wouldn’t like this much arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Matt T

customer_reviews.title: Faulty.
customer_reviews.text: There's a hard piece of plastic, or something hard under the first layer of fabric that keeps rubbing up against my heel giving me blisters. I'm surprised Nike has these kinds of silly flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe. Kinda green.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 12 year old son. He's very picky but likes these. They definitely look green in bright light but you can't tell unless you're studying them.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: A dependable classic
customer_reviews.text: These are the only athletic shoe my picky teen will wear. It’s his 3rd pair. I hope Nike keeps making this style until he starts buying his own shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna

customer_reviews.title: As expected....
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this shoe. He’s had several of the same one in different colors. Fits as expected. My son has worn them for about six weeks and there is a hole forming in the mesh above the toe.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for short runs
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for walking or short runs under five miles. I have had arch issues in the past, but zero issues with these. The only complaint is that small rocks/gravel often get lodged in the tread.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable! I’m an RN and work busy 12 hour shifts. On the run mostly, the shoes are great.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer in FL

customer_reviews.title: Nike Rival
customer_reviews.text: This is one of Nike’s most comfortable shoes, it’s like walking on a cloud. Complete comfort and great for everyday activities. I receive frequent compliments on their style and color. This is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Its just fine
customer_reviews.text: Its fine but not dat look good quality as i expected cus for me its looks cheap But well see how it good it and tel it long last
customer_reviews.author: Mw walsh

customer_reviews.title: Nice enough
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter, the style is nice enough but not our favorite shaping for a Nike sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Drop
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 13 year old son who is a talented athlete, unfortunately the drop on these shoes is too much (more than 10mm) for kids to wear and risk strains, injury as a result are high. Manufacturers should include the drop on the product information.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 9.5 size and must say these are really comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: saiful

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are not holding up well. Purchased in September and now December and falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nike  Comes Through Again
customer_reviews.text: Fit great , comfortable and look good. What more can you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Fraser

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a mesh summer Nike
customer_reviews.text: These light-weight Nike's are good all-around summer shoes for boys/men.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. B.

customer_reviews.title: Fake nikes
customer_reviews.text: Waaaaaaay too big, these are fake nikes!!!! I have only bought bikes for 15 years and always am the same size and these are a size and a half too big.
customer_reviews.author: Sean adams

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable , flexible shoe . I love the look of the shoe. I will definitely buy another pair in black .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the hassle.
customer_reviews.text: Got one shoe that was the right size and the other that was 2 sizes to small. The annoying part is that I couldn’t even take the package back to the UPS store I had to go find a kohl’s and once I returned it I’m having to wait for my refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough to wear at the office for a dressy casual look yet can hit the trail during lunch
customer_reviews.author: Del Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool. But won’t last
customer_reviews.text: Overall comfortable shoe. Quality however not want I expect from Nike. Within a week of wear there were visible signs of degradation
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great arch support which is rare with Nike (from what I’ve experienced). Great for running👍
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: New school shoes
customer_reviews.text: New school shoes delivered just in time for the first day. They fit my 15yr old well with a little room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap
customer_reviews.text: material of the shoe feels very cheap like it would rip after a couple times wearing it. especially at the toe. sent them back.
customer_reviews.author: Edna

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m walking but mostly standing at a huge factory for 12 hours almost daily. These are extremely good on my feet. Breathable, comfortable and stylish!! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Derick Pemberton

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Only shoe that feels good in the toe area. I have tried other shoes but I always go back to these shoes. Great feeling shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Chad A Longstaff

customer_reviews.title: Bang for you Buck.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pair of workout sneakers. Looking to buy again very soon.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat it for the price $
customer_reviews.text: Second pair. Very comfortable and a simple look. Bought a second pair and used old pair for gym. Great show for the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It looks fake Nike ,and it doesn't look like the picture in  real
customer_reviews.text: It looks fake Nike and it doesn't look like the picture in the real
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Half size to big
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pair of shoes, they are very comfortable but they run big. I’ve bought Nike shoes all my life and these are a half size to big.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew willin

customer_reviews.title: Runs Big
customer_reviews.text: Runs big, especially for a Nike. The only time I wished I’d have ordered a size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: BWhit

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are smaller than advertised and only for people who DONT have wide feet
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is so narrow and has no “give” for those with wider feet and the size was not accurate considering I predominantly wear Nike shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Juan A Figueroa Jr

customer_reviews.title: High arch
customer_reviews.text: Arch support were a bit high for running for me,but great walking everyday shoe
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe, but narrow.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of it. It has a high arch. It’s more narrow and the arch is higher than I expected, but it’s a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Connor Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Shortly after my son started wearing them the shoes began to fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Mreat

customer_reviews.title: It’s alright for the price it was at
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t like the shoelaces, but the shoe was solid, I don’t recommend putting it in the dryer though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Cut the top of my foot pretty bad after 1 day of wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Send the right shoe
customer_reviews.text: Was delivered the wrong color way. The shoe itself is great but they delivered the wrong color
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth it !
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about the shoe ! Can’t beat combination of the price and the look !
customer_reviews.author: Emarcus James West

product_meta.title: Nike Men's Renew Rival Fitness Shoes
product_meta.description: Running Shoes Man Nike NIKE RENEW RIVAL AA7400-401
